originContent: COREâ€™s ingestion pipeline has four phases designed to capture evolving context:
translatedContent: COREâ€™un veri toplama hattÄ±, geliÅŸen baÄŸlamÄ± yakalamak iÃ§in tasarlanmÄ±ÅŸ dÃ¶rt aÅŸamadan oluÅŸur:

originContent: 1. **Normalization**: Links new information to recent context, breaks long documents into coherent chunks while keeping cross-references, and standardizes terms so by the time CORE extracts knowledge, itâ€™s working with clean, contextualized input instead of messy text.
translatedContent: 1. **Normalizasyon**: Yeni bilgileri yakÄ±n zamandaki baÄŸlama baÄŸlar, uzun belgeleri tutarlÄ± parÃ§alara ayÄ±rÄ±rken Ã§apraz referanslarÄ± korur ve terimleri standartlaÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r; bÃ¶ylece CORE bilgi Ã§Ä±karÄ±mÄ± yaptÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda, daÄŸÄ±nÄ±k metin yerine temiz ve baÄŸlamsallaÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸ girdiyle Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r.

originContent: 2. **Extraction**: Pulls meaning from normalized text by identifying entities (people, tools, projects, concepts), turning them into statements with context, source, and time, and mapping relationships. For example, â€œWe wrote CORE in Next.jsâ€ becomes: Entities (Core, Next.js), Statement (CORE was developed using Next.js), and Relationship (was developed using).
translatedContent: 2. **Ã‡Ä±karÄ±m**: NormalleÅŸtirilmiÅŸ metinden anlam Ã§Ä±karÄ±r; varlÄ±klarÄ± (kiÅŸi, araÃ§, proje, kavram) tanÄ±mlar, bunlarÄ± baÄŸlam, kaynak ve zamanla ifadeye dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼rÃ¼r ve iliÅŸkileri haritalar. Ã–rneÄŸin, â€œCOREâ€™u Next.js ile yazdÄ±kâ€ ÅŸu ÅŸekilde olur: VarlÄ±klar (CORE, Next.js), Ä°fade (CORE Next.js kullanÄ±larak geliÅŸtirildi), Ä°liÅŸki (geliÅŸtirildi).

originContent: 3. **Resolution**: Detects contradictions, tracks how preferences evolve, and preserves multiple perspectives with provenance instead of overwriting them so memory reflects your full journey, not just the latest snapshot.
translatedContent: 3. **Ã‡Ã¶zÃ¼mleme**: Ã‡eliÅŸkileri tespit eder, tercihlerin nasÄ±l deÄŸiÅŸtiÄŸini izler ve kÃ¶keniyle birlikte birden Ã§ok bakÄ±ÅŸ aÃ§Ä±sÄ±nÄ± korur; bÃ¶ylece hafÄ±za sadece en son anÄ± deÄŸil, tÃ¼m yolculuÄŸunuzu yansÄ±tÄ±r.

originContent: 4. **Graph Integration**: Connects entities, statements, and episodes into a temporal knowledge graph that links facts to their context and history, turning isolated data into a living web of knowledge agents can actually use.
translatedContent: 4. **Grafik Entegrasyonu**: VarlÄ±klarÄ±, ifadeleri ve olaylarÄ± zamansal bir bilgi grafiÄŸinde birleÅŸtirir; gerÃ§ekleri baÄŸlam ve geÃ§miÅŸine baÄŸlar, bÃ¶ylece izole veriyi ajanlarÄ±n gerÃ§ekten kullanabileceÄŸi canlÄ± bir bilgi aÄŸÄ±na dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼rÃ¼r.

originContent: The Result: Instead of a flat database, CORE gives you a memory that grows and changes with you - preserving context, evolution, and ownership so agents can actually use it.

originContent: When you ask CORE a question, it doesnâ€™t just look up text - it digs into your whole knowledge graph to find the most useful answers.

originContent: 1. **Search**: CORE looks through memory from multiple angles at once - keyword search for exact matches, semantic search for related ideas even if phrased differently, and graph traversal to follow links between connected concepts.
translatedContent: 1. **Arama**: CORE aynÄ± anda hafÄ±zada birden Ã§ok aÃ§Ä±dan arama yapar; anahtar kelime aramasÄ± ile tam eÅŸleÅŸmeler, anlamsal arama ile farklÄ± ifade edilmiÅŸ ilgili fikirler ve grafik geÃ§iÅŸi ile baÄŸlÄ± kavramlar arasÄ±ndaki baÄŸlantÄ±lar takip edilir.

originContent: 2. **Re-Rank**: The retrieved results are reordered to highlight the most relevant and diverse ones, ensuring you donâ€™t just see obvious matches but also deeper connections.

originContent: 3. **Filtering**: CORE applies smart filters based on time, reliability, and relationship strength, so only the most meaningful knowledge surfaces.
translatedContent: 3. **Filtreleme**: CORE, zaman, gÃ¼venilirlik ve iliÅŸki gÃ¼cÃ¼ne gÃ¶re akÄ±llÄ± filtreler uygular; bÃ¶ylece yalnÄ±zca en anlamlÄ± bilgiler ortaya Ã§Ä±kar.

originContent: 4. **Output**: You get back both facts (clear statements) and episodes (the original context they came from), so recall is always grounded in context, time, and story.
